mapper.insert: insert into carnehome_member (userid, userpw, username, usermail) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{usermail})
mapper.select: select mem.userid, userpw, username, usermail, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth from carnehome_member mem left outer join carnehome_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid where mem.userid = #{userid}

select mem.userid, userpw, username, usermail, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth from carnehome_member mem left outer join carnehome_member_auth auth on mem.USERID = auth.USERID where mem.username = #{username}
select userpw from carnehome_member where userid = #{userid}
